name: Dungeon of Decisions
description:
!Beta Version! -There is currently no way to end the game and an important gameplay feature is missing. Check back later for future updates.

In the medieval ages you are one of the only doctors left. Only you have the courage and ability to research the cause of the calamity and find the solution.  You must work hard and ensure you save as many people as you can before the calamity wipes them all out.
